title: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to add breakpoints or marks in the left vertical ruler of the java editor in Photon, the popup menu is not appearing.
OB:
1) Open a java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected Behavior:
A menu should appear to allow the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.

Observed Behavior:
The expected menu does not appear when right clicking on the ruler in the java editor.
EB: A menu should appear when right clicking on the left vertical ruler in the java editor.
SR:
1) Open a java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected Behavior:
A menu should appear to allow the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.

Note: The menu does not appear as expected.
